definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: General Zhang Xueliang is a typical representative of patriotism in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 張學良將軍是中國近現代史上愛國主義的典型代表。

sentences.english: Song Yuren is a historical character in modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 宋育仁是中國近現代史上的歷史人物之一。

sentences.english: Zhang Shizhao was a famous statesman and political critic in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 章士釗是我國近現代史上著名的政治活動家和政論家。

sentences.english: Lizi-shao is a famous democrat in Chinese Contemporary History.
sentences.chinese: 邵力子是中國現代史上一位著名的民主人士。

sentences.english: Greece has had a chequered history in the modern era.
sentences.chinese: 希臘的現代史是一段波折不斷的歷史。

sentences.english: Throughout modern history, technological breakthroughs regularly surpass the people who invent them.
sentences.chinese: 縱觀整個現代史，技術突破時常超過發明技術的人類。

sentences.english: The answer is quite simple when considering China’s political system and contemporary history.
sentences.chinese: 答案很簡單，只需要看看中國的政治制度和現代史。

sentences.english: The establishment of Xikang province is a big event in the modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 西康建省是中國近現代史上的一個重要事件。

sentences.english: Tang Baolin is a well-known scholar in the realm of contemporary history of China.
sentences.chinese: 唐寶林是中國現代史領域的知名學者。

sentences.english: Ding Wenjiang is a legend in modern history in China.
sentences.chinese: 丁文江是中國近現代史上的一位奇人。

sentences.english: Which books do you read in Modern China History ?
sentences.chinese: 中國近現代史你都看了哪些書？

sentences.english: It blazed new trails in the modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 這在中國近現代史上仍爲一大創舉。

sentences.english: He says the modern history of the state helps explain the strong reaction.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，該州的現代史有助於解釋這種強烈反應。

sentences.english: In all modern history surely there is no page that will stand so black as that of the rape of Nanking.
sentences.chinese: 在全部現代史上，沒有一頁如南京的姦殺這般黑暗。

sentences.english: Our capacity to come back stronger is unmatched in modern history.
sentences.chinese: 在現代史上，我們的復興能力是無與倫比的。

sentences.english: China is modern history be a patriotism is epic.
sentences.chinese: 中國近現代史是一部愛國主義的史詩。

definition: the New Culture Movement (mid-1910s and 1920s), intellectual revolution against Confucianism aiming to introduce Western elements, especially democracy and science
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
the tone of a school/campus atmosphere
touchstone/fig. test that sth is genuine
